snippet: The start-up, called M-Go, is expected to announce agreements with five of Hollywood's six major movie studios that will allow it to stream or rent movies as soon as they are released on DVD or Blu-ray.
abstract: The start-up, called M-Go, is expected to announce agreements with five of Hollywood's six major movie studios that will allow it to stream or rent movies as soon as they are released on DVD or Blu-ray.

headline.main: A New Movie Streaming Service Has Commitments From Studios
